column6: With a new evil washing over an unsuspecting New York City, the Operative, the Aviatrix, the Surgeon, the Revenant and Achilles blast through dangers from blood-soaked mob warehouses to monster-infested mansions!
column8: | writer:David Liss | Other:DAVID L. SHARPE | Colorist:Andrew J. Troy | colorist:Andy Troy | Inker:Patrick Zircher
